thread.title: Aaron Rodgers and Fanatics Sign Exclusive Memorabilia Deal
thread.title_full: Aaron Rodgers and Fanatics Sign Exclusive Memorabilia Deal - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Aaron Rodgers and Fanatics Sign Exclusive Memorabilia Deal
text:
Fanatics Authentic is now the exclusive autographed collectibles retailer for Green Bay Packers quarterback Aaron Rodgers
Fort Lauderdale, Florida (PRWEB) October 09, 2015
Fanatics, Inc., the market leader for officially licensed sports merchandise, announced its exclusive agreement with the 2014 NFL Most Valuable Player and superstar quarterback Aaron Rodgers. Courtesy of the partnership between Rodgers and Fanatics, the company’s memorabilia division, Fanatics Authentic, will be the sole distributor of authentic Aaron Rodgers memorabilia, offering a rare selection of signed and game-used collectibles on http://www.FanaticsAuthentic.com .
As his 11th season gets underway, Aaron Rodgers is reaching his prime, ranking among the top quarterbacks in the NFL. After being named the 2014 NFL MVP and dominating the opening weeks of the 2015 NFL season, the demand for signed Aaron Rodgers memorabilia is at an all-time high. By working with Fanatics, Rodgers will be able to give his fans a wide variety of unique collectibles that are guaranteed authentic.
“As a player that has shattered the NFL record books and still has a long career ahead, we’re really excited to bring Aaron into the Fanatics family and to offer his dedicated fans a one-of-a-kind selection of his memorabilia,” said Ross Tannenbaum, President of Fanatics Authentic
“By partnering with Fanatics, I can trust that my fans will get the best in authentic autographed collectibles and I look forward to working together in the future,” said Rodgers.
Aaron Rodgers and the Green Bay Packers are currently 4-0 in the NFL. As the 2015 NFL season continues, Rodgers looks to win his second Super Bowl and bring Green Bay its fifth title in franchise history. Rodgers joins some of the most premier names in sports as one of Fanatics’ exclusive athletes, including 2015 NBA Most Valuable Player Stephen Curry, Boston Red Sox first baseman David Ortiz, and Denver Broncos Quarterback Peyton Manning. Rodgers’ autographed memorabilia is available for purchase at http://www.FanaticsAuthentic.com and http://www.Fanatics.com .
About Fanatics
Fanatics is the largest retailer of officially licensed sports merchandise and provides the ultimate shopping experience to sports fans. A top 50 Internet Retailer Company, Fanatics comprises the broadest online assortment by offering hundreds of thousands of officially licensed items via its Fanatics ( http://www.fanatics.com ) and FansEdge (fansedge.com) brands, as well as the largest selection of sports collectibles and memorabilia through Fanatics Authentic ( http://www.fanaticsauthentic.com ). A multi-channel company, Fanatics operates more than 300 online and offline stores, including the e-commerce business for all major professional sports leagues (NFL, MLB, NBA, NHL, NASCAR, PGA), major media brands (NBC Sports, CBS Sports, FOX Sports) and more than 150 collegiate and professional team properties. The company’s in-venue and event retail portfolio includes the NBA, NHL, NASCAR, Texas Longhorns, LSU Tigers, Arizona Coyotes and New Jersey Devils, allowing fans to experience a seamless shopping experience across online, mobile and physical store locations.
